Sentencas: Hybrid direct carbon fuel cells employ a classical solid oxide fuel cell together with carbon dispersed in a carbonate melt on the anode side.
Titulo: Direct Coal Oxidation in Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In a European project, the utilization of various coals has been investigated with and without addition of an oxidation catalyst to the carbon-carbonate slurry or anode layer.
Titulo: Direct Coal Oxidation in Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The nature of the coal affects both open circuit voltage and power output.
Titulo: Direct Coal Oxidation in Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Highest OCV and power densities were observed for bituminous coal and by adding manganese oxide or praseodymium-doped ceria to the carbon/carbonate mixture.
Titulo: Direct Coal Oxidation in Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Comparing the carbon black fueled performance of an anode supported (315 mu m anodes) and cathode supported cell (15 mu m anode) indicates a superior performance of the latter.
Titulo: Direct Coal Oxidation in Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Using un-catalyzed biomass (charcoal) as fuel results in an OCV of 941 mV and a maximum power density of 78 mW/cm(2) at 755 degrees C similar to the power output of manganese oxide catalyzed bituminous coal (73 mW/cm(2)).
Titulo: Direct Coal Oxidation in Modified Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
